name: Growing Pains (itch) (georgle)
description:
You are in the garden. You used to come here all the time, but things have changed.

This is a place of memories, of regrets...

...and of a rather peculiar plant.

--------

Written and developed by George Lockett
Made for subQjam 2019, with the theme: ENVIRONMENT.

Music: 
November – from Bensound (www.bensound.com)
Better Days – from Bensound (www.bensound.com)
